name: Islands (itch) (Dreemore)
description:
Island is a 2D survival game that traps you on a randomly generated island. With only a stick and a few mushrooms, do you think you have what it takes to survive the harsh islands?

Features (Currently in the V0.12 version):

  • Eating
  • PVE
  • Randomly generated islands
  • Many,  many square enemies
  • & More!

Controls:

WASD, click or arrow keys to move

Z to interact (i.e. picking up mushrooms and such)

X to attack with your weapon (right now there's just a stick, sorry)

Click on an item in your hotbar to use/eat it

The two bottom right bars are your health, and hunger, but I'm sure you knew that.

This game's in pre-alpha. I'm currently just trying to get the mechanics down, and the game's still pretty simple. You should expect a lot of bugs/glitches. Also, anything I add in this version might get deleted in another version. Happy gaming :)
